threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

attributes.magic: HTML document, ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Generic ASP webshell which uses any eval/exec function
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: Arnim Rupp (https://github.com/ruppde)

crowdsourced_ai_results.analysis: The script starts by creating a `WScript.Shell` object. It defines a variable `baseRemotePath` which holds a remote path. The script then constructs a full path `xwBatPath` by appending "kano.bat" to the `baseRemotePath`. Finally, it executes the `kano.bat` file located on the remote server using `cmd.exe /c`. The script waits for the execution of `kano.bat` to complete before finishing. The window is minimized during execution.
